"Traspo": "Callin' on all nearby ARKS! This is Traspo of the Supply Division!"
"No matter where someone is, if they need supplies, we deliver. That's what we're here for."
"...Though it doesn't mean much if we always gotta call on help because our trucks are always breaking down..."
"Anyways, I'll get these repairs done as fast as I can. I know I can count on y'all to cover me!"
